title: Freind Unable to launch league of legends
body:
My friend is trying to start playing league of legends but is having trouble starting the client. I talked to them about it and they showed me what happens, but I have no idea what to do so I am asking here. 
They are on a mac and have gotten the mac software. The first time they downloaded it, an error message appeared and said the computer wont allow the directory. The second time they downloaded it, whenever they opened it the starting icon appeared and after one second and then closed without opening the client. 
What should they do? Please help. 
I posted this in the wrong forum before

replies.body:
It sounds like your friend's client is unable to properly reaching our patching servers to finish patching and log in. This is typically caused by a rather poor connection to our servers, so working through our [**Mac Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) should resolve the issue for your friend.

Let me know if this worked for them! ^.^
Thank you! I will send them that link so they can figure it out.
